wtomigraj

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • wtomigraj.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    Class contains few static methods of general purpose so they are used by many other methods in diffrent classes.

    • Method Detail

      • showPacketInfo

        public static void showPacketInfo(java.net.DatagramPacket dp)
        Prints to standard output some information about datagram.
        Parameters:
        dp - datagram packet about which we want to show information.

      • readData

        public static java.lang.String readData(byte[] tab,
                        int length)
        Reads data from datagram buffer, assuming that data is an UTF8 String.
        Parameters:
        tab - buffer of datagram.
        length - length of data.
        Returns:
        String representing message packed in this datagram.

      • send

        public static void send(java.net.DatagramSocket ds,
        AddrInfo addr,
        org.json.JSONObject json)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Sends a json using ds to addr.
        Parameters:
        ds - Socket used to send datagram.
        addr - Address to which we send datagram.
        json - JSONObject that is being sent.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • subarray

        public static java.lang.String[] subarray(java.lang.String[] arr,
                          int beg,
                          int end)
        Returns subarray of an original array. New array is located, which contains references to objects from original array. Indices copied are from the rand [beg, end).
        Parameters:
        arr - Array from which we want a fragment.
        beg - First index.
        end - end-1 is index of last taken element.
        Returns:
        newly allocated array.

      • makeJSON

        public static org.json.JSONObject makeJSON(java.lang.String type)
        Creates a JSONObject with given type of message.
        Parameters:
        type - type of message.
        Returns:
        JSONObject.

      • emptyRes

        public static org.json.JSONObject emptyRes(long id)
        Creates a JSONObject with type of message "emptyresponse" responding to datagram with given id. Usable to confirm delivery of a message which doesn't really need response.
        Parameters:
        id - id of message to which we are responding.
        Returns:
        JSONObject.

      • makeRes

        public static org.json.JSONObject makeRes(java.lang.String type,
                          long id)
        Creates a JSONObject with given type of message responding to datagram with given id.
        Parameters:
        type - type of message.
        id - id of message to which we are responding.
        Returns:
        JSONObject.

      • getChannels

        public static java.lang.String[] getChannels(org.json.JSONArray arr)
                                      throws org.json.JSONException
        Takes a JSONArray object, and assumes that array contain names of channels. Returns that names as a an array of Strings.
        Parameters:
        arr - JSONArray of channel names.
        Returns:
        String array of channel names.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
